name: Data Governance - London 2018
content: Across the two days, attendees will gain all the information needed to design and implement Master Data and Data Governance initiatives successfully. The course is held under Chatham House Rule to promote an open and discussion-based learning environment. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/283294-1?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Prices: Super Early Bird Rate: GBP 1899.0, 3for2 - Super Early Bird Rate: GBP 1266.0, Early Bird Rate: GBP 2099.0, 3for2 - Early Bird Rate: GBP 1399.0, Standard Price: GBP 2299.0, 3for2 Delegate: GBP 1533.0
